str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Alone, but, only. Neuter of monos as adverb; merely.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To boast; I glory (exult) proudly. From some base akin to that of aucheo and euchomai; to vaunt.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Persecution, affliction, distress, tribulation. From thlibo; pressure.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Persecution, affliction, distress, tribulation. From thlibo; pressure.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and ergazomai; to work fully, i.e. Accomplish; by implication, to finish, fashion.
Endurance, steadfastness, patient waiting for. From hupomeno; cheerful endurance, constancy.
